ENTITY.Entity Type: string (one of: GM, Player, Player Character, Non Player Character, Group, Place, Thing)
ENTITY.Entity Aliases: list of strings (alternate names or nicknames)
ENTITY.Entity Status: list of strings (Status ID references in GM Mode)
ENTITY.Entity Relationships: list of strings (Relationship ID references in GM Mode)

RELATIONSHIP.Relationship Description: string (≤100 characters, past tense, uses [Entity] tags)
RELATIONSHIP.Relationship Tags: list of strings (Principal first, then related entities, verbs, and conceptual tags)

STATUS.Status Event ID: string (must match an existing Event ID)
STATUS.Status Description: string (≤100 characters, past tense, uses [Entity] tags)
STATUS.Status Tags: list of strings (Principal first, then related, verbs, and concept tags)

EVENT.Event Description: string (≤100 characters, past tense, uses [Entity] references)
